meaningMnemonic: The <radical>king</radical> is showing his people how to put a <radical>net</radical> around a weird <radical>zombie</radical> by walking around it in a <kanji>loop</kanji>. It's a weird zombie because it has the ground on top of its head instead of dirt.
readingMnemonic: The king also explains that this <kanji>loop</kanji> technique was used by Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん) when he was conquering cities. He'd loop around the entire place with a net and trap them.
